works.description:
According to the protocol of the DMCA  
(Digital Millennium Copyright Act):
1. We have noted that the website owned, is offering free downloads of  
various works belonging to Grupo Planeta, and in particular titles  
attached, all works of Grupo Planeta.
Please note that Grupo Planeta is the exclusive holder, through different 

legal entities of the Group members, PLANETA, DESTINO, SEIX BARRAL,
ESPASA,
BOOKET, MARTINEZ ROCA, ESENCIA, ZAFIRO, CRITICA, MINOTAURO, GESTION 2000, 

DUMMIES, ZENITH, ARIEL, AUSTRAL or TEMAS DE HOY, the rights of numerous  
works that free download is available on its website and in particular,
the  
work cited therefore copying, reproduction, plagiarism, distribution and /
 
or publicly performed without our consent not only contravenes the  
provisions of the Copyright Spanish Laws.
Please, find attached the legal information:
